text: Liu Guizhu (born 18 January 1968) is a Chinese judoka. In 1986 she finished third at the 1987 Fukuoka International Women's Judo Championship, and she finished second at the 1987 Judo Grand Prix DÃ¼sseldorf. At the 1987 World Judo Championships she finished 5th. She won the silver medal at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the lightweight event. At the 1989 she won the silver medal at the Pan Pacific Judo Championship in the -61 kg category. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Judoka Category:Living people Category:Chinese martial artists
title: Liu Guizhu
